text: Slow your roll ‘ Baywatch ’ fans. Alexandra Daddario is squashing claims that she ’ s loved up with costar Zac Efron. Alexandra Daddario, 32, wants to make something very clear : She ’ s not dating Zac Efron. Yes, he was her love interest in the 2017 Baywatch film but the actress claims that, in real life, they ’ re just “ good friends. ” Alexandra clarified their relationship in an interview with PEOPLE. Crushing the hopes of Baywatch fans everywhere, she said on May 31, “ We ’ re very good friends. Zac and I ’ ve worked together, and we ’ re very good friends. ” It ’ s not the first time that Alexandra has claimed that Zac, 30, is in the friendship zone.
